TopicTitle: [Mods] Make the coolest medium-size space craft!

Articles.Content:
Hello this is eyeshank2000 and this is the Make the Coolest medium sized spacecraft challenge (When i mean medium i mean 10-60 parts,thats medium for my computer :/). The allowed mods are: WHO CARES! Mods restriction ripped off due to the pollz!

Good luck!

LEADERBOARD!

Bsalis 1! 9/10

whatshtisthis 2! 8/10 (Honorary number 1)

..................

..................

Achievements!

Must have been hard!: All stock. 2 points

Targeting computer: lasers! 1 point

Artillery ship: RAILGUNZ!(or missiles) 1 point

SSTO: Single stage to orbit! 1 point

VTOL Engaged: Vertical take off and landing capabilities!

I dont need no stinkin console!: Can go to a stable orbit without use of the debug console! 2 point

Screw torpedoes!: Can ram into another ship with little to no major damage! 1 point

Commercial usage: Can hold more passangers then normal! 1 point

Warp speed! Can warp to other ships! 1 point

Docking-ish can dock with other ships...somehow 1 point

(Notice: you can only gain five,anymore and it would be unfair in my opinion)

P.S.

You can use the cheat console for fuel.

this is just an aesthetic challenge

P.S.S.

Ctrl Shift alt D is the cheat console!

P.S.S.S.

It doesnt HAVE to be based on anything,it just has to look good and sci-fi ish.

Edited September 16, 2012 by Eyeshank2000
Just nevermind this
The ship I built based on the Bentenmaru from the anime Mouretsu Pirates might count as a medium sized spaceship, other than the fact that there are quite a lot of fuel lines and struts.

Actually quite good! But i have NEVER heard of the anime :/ (I`m into gundam and such )

I`ll give you a 8/10 (its stilly pretty big and complicated,and what mods does it use for those solar panels?)

Edited September 15, 2012 by Eyeshank2000

Bsalis

What the heck is that thing? I have NO IDEA but it looks pretty good!

Ill give you a 9/10 (It fits all the criteria but WHAT THE HECK IS IT FOR?)
That looks like the sentry thingies that you have to avoid in Metal Gear Solid 2

Actually quite good! But i have NEVER heard of the anime :/ (I`m into gundam and such )

I`ll give you a 8/10 (its stilly pretty big and complicated,and what mods does it use for those solar panels?)

The solar panels are from the Deep Space Mission pack. The ships from Gundam are gonna be quite difficult though. This doesn't even fly well due to the distribution of the engines messing up the balance.

An over-sized Apollo style Mun lander.

General Horizons, Kenjhou-VIII-1a

Crew: Les Hibbert, Jonathon Josephs, Kandace Pickering

150km

Kandace coordinates the landing from the overhead command module; Les and Jonathon ride the lander.

Les Hibbert steps onto the Mun.

Kandace is retrieved from the command module.

Command module is jettisoned to be retrieved and landed on Kerbin later.

Landing engine and airlock are jettisoned to be disintegrated in Kerbin's atmosphere.

The radial solar panels were jettisoned at ~200m/s (Good ol' Kerbal decouplers.)

Right to left: Kandace Pickering, Les Hibbert, Jonathon Josephs

Total mission time: ~2.5 days

Mods used:

-NovaPunch

-Silisko Edition 2 & Probodobodyne [url=]http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12237-Silisko-Industries-Addon-Development-Thread-2

-KW Payload Fairings

-Dynasat [url=]http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/10224-0-15-Parts-Dynasat-Satellites-and-Solar-Panels-new-parts%21-%28rel-0-6%29-Jun-11

-ORDA

-MechJeb [url=]http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12384-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v1-9

-(possibly) Robau's Rocketry

.craft download: [url=]http://www./?e7zy3qpdef91fe8

Hello, kerbals!

I'm presenting you... THE TERMINUS I!!!

It consists of exactly 60 parts! (If you don't count the launch clamp and if I didn't make a mistake when counting)

But look at it yourself...

The "mothership" is capable of hyperjumping into orbit, generate up to 15 units of thrust using an ion engine, recharging the ion engine's batteries using solarkerbolar panels, cancelling out gravitational force, firing six high-powered lasers and, most importantly, looking good.

The small ship is capable of generating up to 1000 units of thrust using a plasma-powered warp engine, getting out if the cargo bay (and in if you don't deploy the kerbolar panels), generating plasma with the kerbolar panels by harvesting kerbolar winds, landing on any celestial body without atmosphere you can actually land on as often as you wish and, most importantly, looking good.

The capsule is capable of being decoupled from the ship and landing safely on Kerbin using a parachute.

Mechanical Mouse Industries Satellite pack

NovaPunch

Gravitsapa

Space junk bay

Sunbeam laser

HyperJump

Several parts whose models are made by different people (I'm sorry that I don't name you here!) but whose configfiles are made by me

Thanks for reading! Live long and prosper!
